start.text: You dock with the 'SS Chimera', a derelict research station that's been silent for years. The air is still and freezing. A single, flickering emergency light casts long, dancing shadows down two corridors.
start.image_prompt: Sci-fi horror concept art. A lone astronaut stands in a vast, dark, and silent docking bay of an ancient, derelict alien space station. The architecture is biomechanical and unsettling. A single flickering light from above illuminates two corridors.

go_to_bridge.image_prompt: First-person view from inside an astronaut's helmet, walking down a dark, metallic corridor. The only light source is the astronaut's headlamp illuminating the path towards a sign that reads 'BRIDGE'.

go_to_crew_quarters.text: You head towards the crew quarters...
go_to_crew_quarters.image_prompt: First-person view from inside an astronaut's helmet, walking down a dark, narrow corridor. The walls are covered in a strange, organic residue. A sign for 'CREW QUARTERS' is barely visible.

bridge_path.text: You enter the bridge. The main viewscreen is cracked, revealing a terrifyingly beautiful swirling nebula. A holographic log is active on a console, looping a silent, frantic message from the alien captain.
bridge_path.image_prompt: Sci-fi horror concept art. The bridge of a derelict alien starship. A massive, cracked viewscreen shows a swirling nebula outside. In the center of the room, a single console projects a flickering, unstable orange hologram of a non-humanoid alien.

access_log.image_prompt: First-person view of an astronaut's gloved hand reaching out and touching a holographic console. The hologram glitches and resolves into a clear image of a frantic alien.

crew_quarters_path.text: The crew quarters are a mess. Personal belongings are strewn about as if the crew vanished mid-sentence. A faint, hypnotic melody emanates from a strange, bioluminescent plant in the corner of the room.
crew_quarters_path.image_prompt: Sci-fi horror concept art. The messy, abandoned crew quarters of an alien starship. Personal belongings are scattered everywhere. In the corner, a single, exotic-looking alien plant with bioluminescent fronds glows with a soft, hypnotic light.

choices.text: Get a closer look at the strange plant.
This place gives you the creeps. Go to the Bridge instead.

go_to_bridge_from_quarters.text: You turn your back on the creepy crew quarters and head towards the bridge.
go_to_bridge_from_quarters.image_prompt: First-person view of an astronaut turning their back on the creepy crew quarters and walking purposefully down a corridor towards a sign that reads 'BRIDGE'.

touch_plant.text: You reach out and your glove makes contact with the plant's pulsating surface. A low hum vibrates through your suit, and the hypnotic melody intensifies, echoing directly inside your mind.
touch_plant.image_prompt: First-person view from inside an astronaut's helmet. A gloved hand is touching the surface of a strange, glowing, bioluminescent alien plant. The point of contact is glowing brightly.

hypnotic_plant_failure.text: The melody envelops you. Your thoughts unravel into beautiful, meaningless patterns. You feel a profound sense of peace as you sink to the floor, your last sight being the gently pulsing fronds of the plant. You are one with the garden now.
hypnotic_plant_failure.image_prompt: Surrealist horror art. An astronaut's helmeted face, with an expression of peaceful horror reflected in the visor. The reflection shows a beautiful but terrifying alien plant with swirling, hypnotic patterns of light. The background is a blur of color.

log_entry.text: The hologram stabilizes. It's a warning. The alien captain gestures frantically at a schematic of the station's life support system, pointing to a parasitic entity that seems to be feeding on it.
log_entry.image_prompt: A close-up of a flickering, translucent orange hologram. The hologram shows the frantic face of a non-humanoid alien. The alien is pointing at a technical schematic of a machine with a strange, cancerous growth on it. The image is glitchy and distorted.

go_to_life_support.text: You rush towards the Life Support chamber.
go_to_life_support.image_prompt: First-person view of an astronaut running down a long, metallic corridor. Red alert lights are flashing. The corridor is labeled 'LIFE SUPPORT' in a glowing alien script.

life_support.text: You find the parasite in the life support chamber. It's a massive, pulsating crystalline growth, latched onto the machinery and glowing with a sickly green light. It seems to be the source of the station's decay.
life_support.image_prompt: Sci-fi horror concept art. A massive, complex piece of alien machinery covered in a pulsating, crystalline, parasitic growth. The growth glows with a sickly green light and has dark, vein-like tendrils burrowing into the machine. The room is dark and filled with steam.

choices.text: Try to purge the parasite from the system.

purge_parasite.text: You prepare to purge the parasite from the system.
purge_parasite.image_prompt: First-person view of an astronaut's gloved hands holding a plasma cutter, firing a bright beam of energy at a pulsating, crystalline alien parasite on a machine. Electrical sparks fly everywhere.

end_win.text: With a final, agonizing screech, the parasite dissolves under your plasma cutter. The station's primary power hums back to life. An automated distress beacon activates, broadcasting your location. You are safe... for now.
end_win.image_prompt: Sci-fi concept art. The previously dark bridge of the alien starship is now fully illuminated with clean, white light. The main viewscreen shows a rescue ship approaching. The lone astronaut looks on from the captain's chair, exhausted but safe.
